guy.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: Dave’s a nice guy when you get to know him.
guy.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: a model of a man burnt every year on Guy Fawkes Night, in Britain
guy.translation[0].definitions[2].defini: a rope that stretches from the top or side of a tent or pole to the ground to keep it in the right position
guy.translation[0].note_box[0].sections[: People say he’s a nice guy.
Phil is a great guy and a lot of fun.
The bad guys all have guns.
He’s one of the good guys in the 'Star Wars' films.
I'm fed up with people always thinking that I am the bad guy.
The poor guy was robbed of all his money.
He’s trying to prove he’s a tough guy.
I knew him in high school. He’s just a regular guy.
He wanted to get elected and fight for the little guy.
